title: Writing Table (France), 1750–70
medium: various woods (rosewood, tulip wood), gilt bronze
description: Table, veneered predominately in rosewood, with shaped rectangular top and serpentine sides, supported by four tall tapering 4-sided cabriole legs. Two shaped drawers, veneered with tulip wood and bordered with narrow veneer, side by side in frieze with similarly shaped inlays back and sides. Tulip wood veneer on two inner surfaces of legs. Top is bronze-edged with rosewood and narrow tulip wood border and inlaid with brown leather with tooled border; gilt bronze keyhole escutcheons and shoes. Stamped on under edge of frieze, left side: P. GARNIER.

tombstone.epitaph: Writing Table (France), 1750–70;  Pierre Garnier ; various woods (rosewood, tulip wood), gilt bronze; H x W x D: 76.5 x 113 x 62 cm (30 1/8 x 44 1/2 x 24 7/16 in.); 1968-158-7-a/c
